rarefy BioTIME

Source: R/rarefyBioTIME.R
rarefysamples.Rd

rarefy BioTIME

rarefysamples(Year, SampleID, Species, currency, resamps)

Arguments

Year

Integer representing year of record

SampleID

Description of unique sampling event, this is used to resample

Species

Highest resolution of taxonomic description available

currency

- set to either Numerical abundance or biomass

resamps

Number of repetitions

Value

A data.frame with rarefied abundances/biomasses

Examples

if (FALSE) {
library(dplyr)

dfr <- # output from gridding process
df <- dplyr::select(dfr, YEAR, Species, ABUNDANCE, rarefyID, SAMPLE_DESC)
stats::setNames(df, c("Year", "Species", "Abundance", "rarefyID", "Samp"))
}
